entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `PublishAot` publish will fail if filepaths are too long on Windows #32044
  • Errors restoring runtime pack #32038
  • Copying unmanaged binaries as part of builds causes crashes when running after modification (macOS, Arm64) #32023
  • Garbled output at PowerShell when I use redirect. #32013

Closed

  • Windows 11 / .NET 8 Preview 3 - Blazor WASM Build Fail: "cache : warning : Accessing the Emscripten cache at "..." (for "sanity") is taking a long time, another process should be writing to it. " #32034
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc][VS64] With .NET 8 preview 3 SDK installed on German OS, warning description is unlocalized when running "dotnet publish -r win10-x64" in CLI. #31213

PullRequests

Created

  • Follow-up to #31559 #32047
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Workaround malformed `typeof` statements in TypeForwardedToAttributes #32014
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • Use 'artifacts' instead of `.artifacts` for default artifacts path #31955
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Support new authentication type for msdeploy #32040
    untriaged
  • Remove ASP.NET Json feature switch #32030
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • updated containers docs #31884
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • Add Nuget vulnerabilities output #32002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32009
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
